Articles.Content:
So after posting my MiG 15 i said i was going to post a MiG 21 and here it is(stock MiG 15 on the way SO PREPARE YOUR DOWNLOAD BUTTON, when i,discover how to post a download link) 

The craft

![FMIG21_vl.jpg](http://www.combataircraft.com/aircraft/FMIG21_vl.jpg)

![jk7oS7H.png](http://i.imgur.com/jk7oS7H.png)![sYc97ah.png](http://i.imgur.com/sYc97ah.png)![g1kFDrw.png](http://i.imgur.com/g1kFDrw.png)![PB51HfX.png](http://i.imgur.com/PB51HfX.png)![CiLVUTp.png](http://i.imgur.com/CiLVUTp.png)

Its VERY maneuverable and normal cruising speed being 150 m/h at average, it can pick up and drop a lot of speed due to double engines and undercarriage air brakes

 I Thought It Look Quite Good,Only Problem Being The Nose Cone Its Not Long Enough Compared To The Real Thing, Other Than That Its Spot On i think anyway you guys can decide 

NO download link because it contains too many mods, it would be a hassle trying to find them all but i'm starting to do stock crafts (hope i don't sound like i'm bragging on about my building skill chances are, your way better than me at this!)

If you upload to KerbalX.com, it identifies all mods automatically for you.

Nice MiG!

Wow, best 21 on the forum.

Needs a bit longer nose though.
he'll need to get the B9 part that fixes the nose length. Otherwise, PERFECT!
